content: 2008 Singaporean film **Missing You...** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 想你的时候; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *xiǎng nǐ dè shí hoù*) is a 2008 Singaporean [romance](/wiki/Romance_film) cum [drama](/wiki/Drama) film about the highs and lows of the Singaporean [getai](/wiki/Getai) trade. Directed by Lin Kun Hui, the film stars [Joshua Ang](/wiki/Joshua_Ang), Christina Lim, [Dasmond Koh](/wiki/Dasmond_Koh), Hsu Chiung Fang and [John Cheng](/wiki/John_Cheng). ## Plot When Zhen (Christina Lim) was young, her grandmother used to bring her to getai shows hosted by getai icon Fang (Hsu Chiung Fang), who now faces spouse abuse behind the glorious front. Zhen grew up to be a pretty and kind hearted lady who displayed an aloof attitude towards men. With a passion in singing, her childhood dream was to perform for her grandmother at a getai show. Qiang ([Joshua Ang](/wiki/Joshua_Ang)), a blue collar worker who washes cars for a living likes Zhen but feels inferior because of his livelihood. Oblivious to Qiang's pursuit, Zhen falls for Simon but being a [Casanova](/wiki/Casanova), he soon leaves Zhen for another woman. Thereafter, Qiang realized that he suffers from a [terminal illness](/wiki/Terminal_illness) but perseveres to fulfill Zhen's wish of singing at the getai show and ends up sacrificing his own life... ## Cast - [Dasmond Koh](/wiki/Dasmond_Koh) as Simon - [Joshua Ang](/wiki/Joshua_Ang) as Qiang - Christina Lim as Zhen This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. title: Missing You (2008 film)
